snippet.title: 7  Breaking Vendor Lock In. How to Regain Control Over Your Tech Stack
snippet.description:
🔓 Breaking Vendor Lock-In: How to Regain Control Over Your Tech Stack  
🎥 Episode 7 of 10 — Out Now

Feeling trapped by outdated contracts, rigid platforms, or "solutions" that no longer serve you?

You’re not alone.  
💰 High switching costs  
🔒 Proprietary lock-in  
🚫 Zero flexibility

Vendor lock-in is one of the CTO’s most frustrating handcuffs—and it’s time to break free.

🎥 In this short but game-changing video, we explore:
🧩 Why legacy systems often lock you into subpar vendors  
⚙️ How modern, agnostic architectures give you *real* flexibility  
🚀 How NKD Agility helps CTOs reclaim control of their tech stack without breaking operations

It’s not just about tech—it’s about freedom to innovate, choose, and scale on your terms.

🔄 We design transitions that reduce risk, restore control, and future-proof your architecture.

If you're tired of being at the mercy of legacy vendors, this video is your first step toward independence.

👇 Watch it now. Follow for the full 10-part series. Visit https://nkdagility.com/capabilities/azure-devops-migration-services/ if you need help with your #azuredevops or #devopsmigration

#CTO #VendorLockIn #TechFreedom #LegacySystems #DevOpsStrategy #EngineeringExcellence #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #ModernArchitecture
